languages.text: {n}Единственное слово заставляет тело сервитора изогнуться в жестокой судороге. Из горла рвется всхлип или рык, механические конечности судорожно сокращаются.{/n}
{n}That single word causes the servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Единственное слово заставляет тело сервитора изогнуться в жестокой судороге. Из горла рвется всхлип или рык, механические конечности судорожно сокращаются.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A single word causes the Servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl is building up in its throat, and its mechanical appendages are jerking convulsively.{/n}
{n}A single word causes the Servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl is building up in its throat, and its mechanical appendages are jerking convulsively.{/n}
{n}That single word causes the Servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}
{n}That single word causes the Servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}
{n}That single word causes the servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}

languages.text: {n}听到这个词之后，这个机仆的身体剧烈地抽搐起来。它的喉咙中发出了类似于啜泣或咆哮的声音，机械躯体的附属物不停地颤抖。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That single word causes the servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}听到这个词之后，这个奴工的身体剧烈地抽搐起来。它的喉咙中发出了类似于啜泣或咆哮的声音，机械躯体的附属物不停地颤抖。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esa palabra hace que el cuerpo del servidor se retuerza en un espasmo violento. Algo similar a un sollozo o un gruñido surge de su garganta, y sus apéndices mecánicos convulsionan sin control.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That single word causes the servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esa palabra hace que el cuerpo del servidor se retuerza en un espasmo violento. Algo similar a un sollozo o un gruñido surge de su garganta, y sus apéndices mecánicos convulsionan sin control.{/n}

languages.text: {n}その一言に、サーヴィターの身体が激しく痙攣した。嗚咽や唸りにも似た声が喉の奥から発せられ、機械的な関節がピクピクと動いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That single word causes the servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その一言に、サーヴィターの身体が激しく痙攣した。嗚咽や唸りにも似た声が喉の奥から発せられ、機械的な関節がピクピクと動いている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dieses eine Wort löst im Körper des Servitors einen heftigen Krampf aus. In seiner Kehle bildet sich etwas, das ein Schluchzen oder Knurren sein könnte, und alle seine mechanischen Gliedmaßen zucken unkontrolliert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That single word causes the servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dieses eine Wort löst im Körper des Servitors einen heftigen Krampf aus. In seiner Kehle bildet sich etwas, das ein Schluchzen oder Knurren sein könnte, und alle seine mechanischen Gliedmaßen zucken unkontrolliert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}À ce simple mot, le corps du servitor est soudain parcouru de violents spasmes. De sa gorge monte quelque chose qui ressemble à un sanglot ou à un grognement tandis que des soubresauts convulsifs agitent ses appendices.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That single word causes the servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu kelime, hizmetörün bedeninin şiddetli bir kasılmayla çarpılmasına sebep oluyor. Hıçkırığa ya da iniltiye benzer bir ses boğazında düğümleniyor ve mekanik uzuvları kasılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}That single word causes the servitor's body to twist in a violent spasm. Something akin to a sob or a growl builds in its throat, and its mechanical appendages jerk convulsively.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu kelime servitörün bedeninin şiddetli bir kasılmayla bükülmesine sebep oluyor. Hıçkırmaya ya da iniltiye benzer bir ses boğazında düğümleniyor ve mekanik uzuvları kasılıyor.{/n}
